Purple Prairie Botanicals Avocado Coconut Exfoliating Mask  (2019 formulation)

Brand: Purple Prairie Botanicals

Category: Mask
book: 2081-Purple Prairie Botanicals Avocado Coconut Exfoliating Mask  (2019 formulation)

chunk: Ingredients: Aqua (water), hamamelis virginiana (witch hazel), Persea Gratissima (avocado) Oil, Montmorillonite (French Green Clay), Zeolite Amargosa (clay), bentonite (clay), organic cocos nucifera (coconut), oenothera biennis (evening primrose) oil, cetearyl alcohol, pelargonium graveolens (geranium) oi, cymbopogon schoenanthus (lemongrass) oil,
book: 2081-Purple Prairie Botanicals Avocado Coconut Exfoliating Mask  (2019 formulation)

chunk: (clay), bentonite (clay), organic cocos nucifera (coconut), oenothera biennis (evening primrose) oil, cetearyl alcohol, pelargonium graveolens (geranium) oi, cymbopogon schoenanthus (lemongrass) oil, rosmarinus officinalis (rosemary) leaf extract
book: 2081-Purple Prairie Botanicals Avocado Coconut Exfoliating Mask  (2019 formulation)

chunk:
Directions: Apply to face in a circular motion to lightly exfoliate. Avoid eyes. Allow to completely dry for extra goodness. Wash off and enjoy your reborn skin.

Warnings: External Use Only.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 2081-Purple Prairie Botanicals Avocado Coconut Exfoliating Mask  (2019 formulation)
